short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On the fly measuring box used by click and drag action. It can be used on any website to find out what size an element or image is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the mouse to click and drag over an area of the webpage to measure the content underneath.
This also tells you what the aspect ratio is.
